alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 9:27AM PST until November 28 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to three inches. Total snowfall of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Post Falls, Davenport, Fairfield, Spokane Valley, Hayden, Cheney, Coeur d`Alene, Rockford, Downtown Spokane, Airway Heights, and Worley. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
